ProcessingCore.Description:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Generates power. Increases power storage by 400. Can use Mining Priority and System Recharge

Enables:
- ACRs
ProcessingCore.Name: Processing Core

ACR.Description:
Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Genetron structures, and repair.

Can attack ground units.
ACR.Name: ACR

FilteringPlant.Description: Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
FilteringPlant.Name: Filtering Plant

Spitfire.Description:
Skirmish unit.

Can attack ground units.
Spitfire.Name: Spitfire

Fixer.Description:
Anti-light specialist. Can use Repair.

Can attack ground units.
Fixer.Name: Fixer

Blitzer.Description:
General purpose combat unit. Can use Supercharge and Overdrive.

Power user.Can attack ground and air units.
Blitzer.Name: Blitzer

Equalizer.Description:
Anti-armor craft.

Can attack ground units.
Equalizer.Name: Equalizer

Aquila.Description:
Support trooper. Can use Nanite Emitter.

Power user.
Can attack ground and air units.
Aquila.Name: Aquila

AnalysisTerminal.Description:
Contains weapon upgrades for Genetron light ground units, and armor upgrades for all Genetron ground units, and upgrades for the Spitfire.

Enables:
- Blitzers at the Manufacturer
- Moles at the Fabricator
- Repulsors from ACRs
- Interdictors from ACRs
AnalysisTerminal.Name: Analysis Terminal

Repulsor.Description:
Anti-ground defensive structure. Can burrow, disabling its weapon, and rendering itself invisible to enemies.

Can attack ground units.
Repulsor.Name: Repulsor

RepulsorBurrowed.Description:
Anti-ground defensive structure. Can burrow, disabling its weapon, and rendering itself invisible to enemies.

Can attack ground units.
RepulsorBurrowed.Name: Repulsor

Interdictor.Description:
Anti-air defensive structure. Can burrow, disabling its weapon, and rendering itself invisible to enemies.

Can attack air units.
Detector
Interdictor.Name: Interdictor

InterdictorBurrowed.Description:
Anti-air defensive structure. Can burrow, disabling it's attack, and rendering it invisible to enemies.

Can attack air units.
Detector
InterdictorBurrowed.Name: Interdictor

RelayTower.Description:
Increases power storage by 100. Can use System Recharge.

Enables:
- Processors at the Processing Core
RelayTower.Name: Relay Tower

Fabricator.Description:
Produces heavy machines.

Enables:
- Torrents
- Moles
Fabricator.Name: Fabricator

Mole.Description:
Deployable artillery cannon and radar suite.

Can attack ground units.
Mole.Name: Mole

MoleRooted.Description:
Deployable artillery cannon and radar suite.

Can attack ground units.
MoleRooted.Name: Mole

MoleBurrowed.Description:
Deployable artillery cannon and radar suite.

Can attack ground units.
MoleBurrowed.Name: Mole

Torrent.Description:
Anti-air artillary.

Can attack ground and air units.
Torrent.Name: Torrent

Virtus.Description:
Heavy tank. Can use Self-fix Protocol.

Power user.
Can attack ground units.
Virtus.Name: Virtus

Inciter.Description:
Grenade attacker. Can jump up and down cliffs. Can use ELOR Protocol.

Power user.
Can attack ground units.
Inciter.Name: Inciter

Tesla.Description:
Area control specialist. Can construct and launch specialized charges.

Power user.
Tesla.Name: Tesla

TechVault.Description:
Contains weapon upgrades for Genetron heavy ground units, and weapon and armor upgrades for Genetron air units.

Enables:
- Inciters at the Fabricator
- Virtus at the Fabricator
TechVault.Name: Tech Vault

AssemblyArray.Description:
Aircraft production facility.

Enables:
- Avengers
- Hornets
AssemblyArray.Name: Assembly Array

Scion_Avenger.Description:
Quick interceptor. Can use Vengeance Missile.

Power user.
Can attack air units.
Scion_Avenger.Name: Avenger

Courier.Description:
Stealth transport. Can use Cloak and Optical Disruption.

Power user.
Courier.Name: Courier

Jupiter.Description:
Bomber aircraft. Can use Revenant Bomb to damage enemies, and apply napalm on the ground for damage over time.

Power user.
Jupiter.Name: Jupiter

Boar.Description:
Armored craft with a bladed hull, and light machine guns. Can use Ignition Blast.

Power user.
Can attack ground and air units.
Boar.Name: Boar

Hornet.Description:
Fast anti-ground fighter that excels against armored targets.

Can attack ground units.
Hornet.Name: Hornet

Badger.Description:
Large gunship. Can use Powershell.

Power user.
Can attack ground and air units simultaneously.
Badger.Name: Badger

Generator.Description: Generates power. Increases power storage by 50.
Generator.Name: Generator

ChemicalFirm.Description:
Enables:
- Aquilas at the Manufacturer
- Teslas at the Fabricator
ChemicalFirm.Name: Chemical Firm

OrdnanceCache.Description:
Enables:
- Jupiters at the Assembly Array
- Badgers at the Assembly Array
OrdnanceCache.Name: Ordnance Cache

OutfittingStation.Description:
Enables:
- Fixers at the Manufacturer- Equalizers at the Manufacturer
OutfittingStation.Name: Outfitting Station

Olympus.Description: Weapon of mass destruction. Uses power to energize a global strike weapon that deals damage in a large area.
Olympus.Name: Olympus

Scion_Processor.Description:
Support unit. Can use System Recharge.

Power user.Detector
Scion_Processor.Name: Processor

Scion_ProcessorStatic.Description:
Support unit. Can use System Recharge.

Power user.Detector
Scion_ProcessorStatic.Name: Processor
